I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
a: nat
n: nat
P: (nat * list (bsm_instr n))%type
i: nat
x: pos n
q: nat
p: nat
v: Vector.t (list bool) n
st: (nat * Vector.t (list bool) n)%type

Goal:
(i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = nil -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a]-> st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ P // (q, v) -[b]-> st}

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
POP : forall n : nat, pos n -> nat -> nat -> bsm_instr n
Notation pos := Fin.t
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive bsm_instr (n : nat) : Set := bsm_pop : pos n -> nat -> nat -> bsm_instr n | bsm_push : pos n -> bool -> bsm_instr n Arguments bsm_instr _%nat_scope Arguments bsm_pop [n]%nat_scope _ (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments bsm_push [n]%nat_scope _ _%bool_scope
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
bsm_steps_POP_0_inv : forall (a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = Zero :: ll -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ P // (p, v[ll/x]) -[b] -> st}
bsm_steps_POP_1_inv : forall (a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = One :: ll -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -[b] -> st}
bsm_steps_POP_any_inv : forall (a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (b : bool) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = b :: ll -> p = 1 + i -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b0 : nat | b0 < a /\ P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -[b0] -> st}
bsm_compute_POP_E : forall (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = nil -> P // (q, v) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
bsm_compute_POP_0 : forall (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = Zero :: ll -> P // (p, v[ll/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
bsm_compute_POP_any : forall (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (b : bool) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = b :: ll -> p = 1 + i -> P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
bsm_compute_POP_1 : forall (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = One :: ll -> P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
bsm_compute_PUSH : forall (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (b : bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, PUSH x b :: nil) <sc P -> P // (1 + i, v[(b :: v#>x)/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
bsm_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : bsm_instr n -> bsm_state n -> bsm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = nil -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (q, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = Zero :: ll -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (p, v[ll/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = One :: ll -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (1 + i, v[ll/x])) ->...-> P b b0 b1
bsm_sss_sind : forall (n : nat) (P : bsm_instr n -> bsm_state n -> bsm_state n -> SProp), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = nil -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (q, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = Zero :: ll -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (p, v[ll/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = One :: ll -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (1 + i, v[ll/x])) ->...-> P b b0 b1
in_bsm_sss_pop_E : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = nil -> bsm_sss (POP x p q) (i, v) (q, v)
Inductive bsm_sss (n : nat) : bsm_instr n -> bsm_state n -> bsm_state n ->...-> bsm_sss (POP x p q) (i, v) (1 + i, v[ll/x]) | in_bsm_sss_push : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (b : bool) (v : vec (list bool) n), bsm_sss (PUSH x b) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(b :: v#>x)/x]) Arguments bsm_sss [n]%nat_scope Arguments in_bsm_sss_pop_E [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments in_bsm_sss_pop_0 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ (_ _)%nat_scope _ [ll]%list_scope Arguments in_bsm_sss_pop_1 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ (_ _)%nat_scope _ [ll]%list_scope Arguments in_bsm_sss_push [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%bool_scope
in_bsm_sss_pop_0 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = Zero :: ll -> bsm_sss (POP x p q) (i, v) (p, v[ll/x])
in_bsm_sss_pop_1 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = One :: ll -> bsm_sss (POP x p q) (i, v) (1 + i, v[ll/x])
bsm_state = fun n : nat => (nat * vec (list bool) n)%type : nat -> Set Arguments bsm_state _%nat_scope
VectorSpec.append_splitat : forall (v0 : vec ?A ?n) (w : vec ?A ?m) (vw : vec ?A (?n + ?m)), VectorDef.splitat ?n vw = (v0, w) -> vw = VectorDef.append v0 w where ?A : [n : nat a : nat P : nat * list (bsm_instr n) i : nat x : pos n p : nat q : nat v : vec (list bool) n st : nat * vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat a : nat P : nat * list (bsm_instr n) i : nat x : pos n p : nat q : nat v : vec (list bool) n st : nat * vec (list bool) n |- nat] ?m : [n : nat a : nat P : nat * list (bsm_instr n) i : nat x : pos n p : nat q : nat v : vec (list bool) n st : nat * vec (list bool) n |- nat]
VectorSpec.splitat_append : forall (v0 : vec ?A ?n) (w : vec ?A ?m), VectorDef.splitat ?n (VectorDef.append v0 w) = (v0, w) where ?A : [n : nat a : nat P : nat * list (bsm_instr n) i : nat x : pos n p : nat q : nat v : vec (list bool) n st : nat * vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat a : nat P : nat * list (bsm_instr n) i : nat x : pos n p : nat q : nat v : vec (list bool) n st : nat * vec (list bool) n |- nat] ?m : [n : nat a : nat P : nat * list (bsm_instr n) i : nat x : pos n p : nat q : nat v : vec (list bool) n st : nat * vec (list bool) n |- nat]
VectorSpec.append_comm_cons : forall (v0 : vec ?A ?n) (w : vec ?A ?m) (a0 : ?A), a0 ## VectorDef.append v0 w = VectorDef.append (a0 ## v0) w where ?A : [n : nat a : nat P : nat * list (bsm_instr n) i : nat x : pos n p : nat q : nat v : vec (list bool) n st : nat * vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat a : nat P : nat * list (bsm_instr n) i : nat x : pos n p : nat q : nat v : vec (list bool) n st : nat * vec (list bool) n |- nat] ?m : [n : nat a : nat P : nat * list (bsm_instr n) i : nat x : pos n p : nat q : nat v : vec (list bool) n st : nat * vec (list bool) n |- nat]
VectorSpec.eta : forall v0 : vec ?A (S ?n), v0 = VectorDef.hd v0 ## VectorDef.tl v0 where ?A : [n : nat a : nat P : nat * list (bsm_instr n) i : nat x : pos n p : nat q : nat v : vec (list bool) n st : nat * vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat a : nat P : nat * list (bsm_instr n) i : nat x : pos n p : nat q : nat v : vec (list bool) n st : nat * vec (list bool) n |- nat]
VectorSpec.uncons_cons : forall (a0 : ?A) (v0 : vec ?A ?n), VectorDef.uncons (a0 ## v0) = (a0, v0) where ?A : [n : nat a : nat P : nat * list (bsm_instr n) i : nat x : pos n p : nat q : nat v : vec (list bool) n st : nat * vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat a : nat P : nat * list (bsm_instr n) i : nat x : pos n p : nat q : nat v : vec (list bool) n st : nat * vec (list bool) n |- nat]
VectorDef.splitat : forall l r : nat, vec ?A (l + r) -> vec ?A l * vec ?A r where ?A : [n : nat a : nat P : nat * list (bsm_instr n) i : nat x : pos n p : nat q : nat v : vec (list bool) n st : nat * vec (list bool) n |- Type]
in_bsm_sss_push : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (b : bool) (v : vec (list bool) n), bsm_sss (PUSH x b) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(b :: v#>x)/x])
BSM_HALTING = fun P : BSM_PROBLEM => let (n, s) := P in let (i, s0) := s in let (P0, v) := s0 in sss_terminates (bsm_sss (n:=n)) (i, P0) (i, v) : BSM_PROBLEM -> Prop
sss_stall_step_0 : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (ii : instr) (P : nat * list instr) (q : nat) (st st' : nat * data), (fst st, ii :: nil) <sc P -> sss_stall one_step ii st -> sss_steps one_step P q st st' -> q = 0 /\ st = st'
subcode_cons_inj : forall (X : Type) (i : nat) (ρ δ : X) (P : code X), (i, ρ :: nil) <sc P -> (i, δ :: nil) <sc P -> ρ = δ
in_code_subcode : forall (X : Type) (i : nat) (P : code X), in_code i P -> exists a : X, (i, a :: nil) <sc P
sss_step_stall_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (st : nat * data), sss_step_stall one_step P st -> {ii : instr | (fst st, ii :: nil) <sc P /\ sss_stall one_step ii st} + {out_code (fst st) P}
sss_stall_step_stall : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (ii : instr) (P : nat * list instr) (st : nat * data), (fst st, ii :: nil) <sc P -> sss_stall one_step ii st -> sss_step_stall one_step P st
sss_step_subcode_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (ii : instr) (st st' : nat * data), (fst st, ii :: nil) <sc P -> sss_step one_step P st st' -> one_step ii st st'
bsm_sss_stall : forall (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (s : nat * vec (list bool) n), sss_step_stall (bsm_sss (n:=n)) P s -> out_code (fst s) P
subcode_cons_invert_right : forall (X : Type) (j : nat) (J : X) (Q : list X) (i : nat) (I : X), (i, I :: nil) <sc (j, J :: Q) -> i = j /\ I = J \/ (i, I :: nil) <sc (S j, Q)
subcode_sss_steps_stop : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (P : nat * list instr) (i : instr) (k : nat) (st1 st2 : nat * data), (forall st : nat * data, ~ one_step i st1 st) -> (fst st1, i :: nil) <sc P -> sss_steps one_step P k st1 st2 -> k = 0 /\ st1 = st2
sss_steps_output_fun : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : nat * list instr) (a b : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), sss_steps one_step P a st1 st2 /\ out_code (fst st2) P -> sss_steps one_step P b st1 st3 /\ out_code (fst st3) P -> a = b /\ st2 = st3
subcode_cons_invert_left : forall (X : Type) (Q : code X) (i : nat) (I : X) (l : list X), (i, I :: l) <sc Q -> (i, I :: nil) <sc Q /\ (S i, l) <sc Q
subcode_app_invert_right : forall (X : Type) (j : nat) (Q1 Q2 : list X) (i : nat) (I : X), (i, I :: nil) <sc (j, Q1 ++ Q2) -> (i, I :: nil) <sc (j, Q1) \/ (i, I :: nil) <sc (length Q1 + j, Q2)
sss_steps_stop_fun : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : code instr) (a b : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), out_code (fst st2) P -> out_code (fst st3) P -> sss_steps one_step P a st1 st2 -> sss_steps one_step P b st1 st3 -> a = b /\ st2 = st3
subcode_sss_progress_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : code instr) (Q : nat * list instr) (p : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), out_code (fst st3) P -> P <sc Q -> sss_progress one_step P st1 st2 -> sss_steps one_step Q p st1 st3 -> exists q : nat, q < p /\ sss_steps one_step Q q st2 st3
sss_compute_step_out_inv : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop), (forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : nat * data), one_step i s t1 -> one_step i s t2 -> t1 = t2) -> forall (P : code instr) (k : nat) (st1 st2 st3 : nat * data), st1 <> st2 -> out_code (fst st3) P -> sss_compute one_step P st1 st2 -> sss_steps one_step P k st1 st3 -> exists q : nat, q < k /\ sss_steps one_step P q st2 st3
ZMicromega.ceiling = fun a b : BinNums.Z => let (q, r) := BinInt.Z.div_eucl a b in match r with | BinNums.Z0 => q | _ => BinInt.Z.add q (BinNums.Zpos BinNums.xH) end : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z Arguments ZMicromega.ceiling (_ _)%Z_scope
subcode_sss_compute_linstr : forall (instr : Set) (data : Type) (one_step : instr -> nat * data -> nat * data -> Prop) (k : nat) (li : list instr) (P : nat * list instr) (st1 st2 st : nat * data), sss_steps one_step (fst st1, li) k st1 st2 -> (fst st1, li) <sc P -> sss_compute one_step P st2 st -> sss_compute one_step P st1 st

``` 
intros.
intros.
intros.
intros.
intros.
intros.
unfold subcode in H0.
inversion_clear H0.
unfold latch_stalling_configuration in H.
inversion H; subst.
destruct P as [i' v'].
unfold subcode in H6.
inversion_clear H6.
inversion H0.
rewrite H3 in H11.
inversion H11.
rewrite H12 in H2.
contradiction.
inversion H11.
contradiction.
rewrite H3 in H10.
destruct P.
unfold sss_sem_step in H2.
rewrite H12 in H2.
inversion H2.
inversion_clear H14.
unfold latch_stalling in H4.
contradiction.
unfold latch_stalling in H4.
destruct (bsm_sss_POP_any_inv _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ H) as [k [Hk1 Hk2]].
exists k.
split.
apply Hk1.
apply Hk2.
Qed.

original: intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. unfold subcode in H0. inversion_clear H0. unfold latch_stalling_configuration in H. inversion H; subst. destruct P as [i' v']. unfold subcode in H6. inversion_clear H6. inversion H0. rewrite H3 in H11. inversion H11. rewrite H12 in H2. contradiction. inversion H11. contradiction. rewrite H3 in H10. destruct P. unfold sss_sem_step in H2. rewrite H12 in H2. inversion H2. inversion_clear H14. unfold latch_stalling in H4. contradiction. unfold latch_stalling in H4. destruct (bsm_sss_POP_any_inv _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ H) as [k [Hk1 Hk2]]. exists k. split. apply Hk1. apply Hk2.
